name: Operation Graduation
description:
*Not affiliated with the US Air Force or the United States Air Force Academy*

You are a senior at the United States Air Force Academy weeks away from graduation. However, something terrible happens. You have been caught taking too many snacks from Mitchell Hall, and now you are not being allowed to graduate. 

After a few days in despair, you decide to take matters into your own hands and earn your graduation back. You must defeat the Dean, Commandant, and Superintendent in order to graduate. But if you lose your three lives, you will get kicked out of the Air Force Academy. Good luck.

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

Esc/P to Pause

When paused press m for menu

To quick reset the game press esp/p then m

Music

Raxlen Slice - Into The Wild Blue Yonder

  Contains music ©2021 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io)

  Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

This game is not meant to be perfect, but rather more of a "gag" game and a way for me to practice some skills. During this project I tended to do things the hard way making it take longer,  but allowing me to learn along the way.  I attached a text file where I sort of logged what I did when on the game if you're interest. I plan on making more games (hopefully of better quality than this) so stay tuned.
